description:
**Fix Overview**:

To address the PowerShell elevation of privilege vulnerability identified as CVE-2024-38033:

1. Apply the appropriate update package based on your Windows version from the links provided below.
2. After downloading, install the update and restart your system to ensure changes take effect.

**Details**:
- This update addresses improper input validation vulnerabilities that could allow an attacker to elevate privileges.
- Ensure you select the correct update corresponding to your operating system build number.

**Update Packages**:
- Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
- Windows 10 for x64-based Systems: [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
- Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
- Windows 11 Version 21H2: [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)

**Preconditions**:
- Verify that you are running a supported Windows version with the specified build numbers.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the updates.
